forecast.name: Today
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Drizzle then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle before 11am. Partly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the morning unfolds with a delicate uncertainty, an atmosphere tinged with the promise of a soft drizzle that may lightly kiss the pavement before 11 a.m. The sun peers through the shifting clouds, casting a gentle glow amidst a high reaching toward the modest warmth of 60 degrees. As the hours progress, expect a subtle descent in temperature, settling closer to 58, while a lively west-southwest wind whispers through the streets, fluttering the leaves and stirring the air around the iconic landmarks that define this beloved city.

This day bears the hallmark of an almost understated charm. While the clouds gather and disperse above, hints of fog linger at the fringes, perhaps hugging the iconic Golden Gate Bridge, a specter of the marine layer reminding passersby of the bay's ever-present embrace. As evening approaches and the clouds deepen, with temperatures dipping to a comfortable 53, a well-layered outfit becomes a good companion—comfortable long sleeves paired with a light jacket to shield against the cooling breeze. The day invites a leisurely walk along the waterfront or a quiet rendezvous at a local café, where the rich scent of coffee shrouds in warmth, providing a cozy refuge from the ever-changing skies.
